title: THE RUGBY LEGEND WHO BECAME A BUDDHIST BY READING QUANTUM PHYSICS
content: Onlanka News – by Walter Jayawardhana The rugby legend Jonny Wilkinson hit world headlines  due to his 2003 World Cup final heroics, when his drop goal in the last minute of extra-time delivered the trophy to England.
